Inside Macintosh: Networking With Open Transport / Part 2 - Open Transport Reference

Chapter 24 - Mappers Reference

This chapter describes the constants, data types and functions that you use with mappers. You can also use general provider data types and functions with mappers. General structures and functions are described in the chapter "Providers Reference".
